top.title: Attack on Kyiv shows 'Russia doesn't want peace', Zelensky says
top.summary: The 10-hour missile and drone barrage directed at Ukraine's capital killed two people and left 32 injured, local authorities say.

top.title: Thailand-Cambodia ceasefire begins after weeks of deadly clashes
top.summary: Almost one million people were displaced when hostilities resumed earlier this month after the first truce broke.

top.title: New York blanketed in snow, sparking travel chaos
top.summary: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled and more than 3,000 were delayed by the winter storm.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.
